Package jeu_console

Class Character

java.lang.Object
jeu_console.Occupant
jeu_console.Character
All Implemented Interfaces:
Moveable, Questionnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Cheater, Hunter, Wise
public abstract class Character extends Occupant implements Moveable
Describe a character on a map by means of a position, a name and a character
Author:
Vital FOCHEUX

    Character(Position pos, String nom, char c)
